summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on an urban road. There are several pedestrians on the right side of the road, and a white van is parked on the left side. The vehicle is moving at a consistent speed, maintaining a safe distance from the pedestrians and other vehicles.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and staying in its lane. The driver is cautious due to the presence of pedestrians on the right side and a parked van on the left side. The vehicle is ensuring a safe distance from the pedestrians and other vehicles.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A group of pedestrians, approximately 5 meters away, walking along the sidewalk. 2) Left side: A white van, approximately 3 meters away, parked on the roadside.
